description: Yeehaa is a seasoned professional in digital transformation and innovation leadership. With a master's in Business Administration and roles in top consulting firms, he drives strategic digital initiatives. Expertise includes digital strategy, change management, and business development. He has authored articles on internet fragmentation and curated courses on personal and startup growth.
blurb: Fragmentation of the internet mirrors Earth's tectonic shifts and exploitative tech practices. Embracing fragmented systems, 'ecosystem architecture' aims for creating vibrant, sustainable digital ecosystems.
